home.title: PRAHO! Project
home.heroTagline: Through art and sincere words, we return humanity to places.

cookies.heading: Your privacy matters to us
cookies.description: We use cookies to improve your experience, analyze traffic, and personalize content. You can customize your preferences or accept all cookies.

about.title: About the project
about.originP1: The PRAHO! project was founded in October 2021 as a creative initiative connecting art with public space. From stickers and posters through billboards to art installations with QR codes — all these formats invite passers-by to stop and reflect.
about.originP2: Since its inception, the project has collected over 30,000 testimonials from people across the Czech Republic and abroad.
about.pillarsP1: PRAHO! stands on three fundamental pillars: art in public space, authentic testimonials from people, and community connection. We believe art should be accessible and natural — not locked behind gallery walls.
about.outputsP1: Our work includes the four-part PRAHO! publication, the Změny underground passage, the Queer All Year initiative, the We Should Have a Talk exhibition, the interactive game Máš čas? at Kačerov metro station, the game A co teď? and the Crossroads installation at the Prague Congress Centre.
about.shopSubtitle: A piece of PRAHO! for you
about.shopP1: In our e-shop you'll find publications, games and other products carrying the spirit of the PRAHO! project. Every purchase supports our ongoing work.
about.directionP1: The PRAHO! project is constantly evolving. We plan new installations, expand international cooperation and prepare projects supported by European grants.
about.supportP1: PRAHO! project, z.s. is a nonprofit association. All our activities are funded through grants, donations and e-shop sales. Your support allows us to continue what we do.

manifest.title: Manifest
manifest.vision: Through art and sincere words, we return humanity to places.
manifest.mission: We create space for sharing intimate thoughts and authentic feelings. Art as an accessible, natural part of city life.
manifest.creativityDesc: Innovation, discovery, inspiration. New themes, techniques, playful, interactive and collective creation.
manifest.humanityDesc: Community, connection, friendliness. Dialogues across differences, kindness, respect and openness.
manifest.inclusionDesc: Openness, diversity, accessibility. Art as a shared process — physically, linguistically and mentally accessible.
manifest.freedomDesc: Innovation, liberation, autonomy. Creative freedom, flexible non-hierarchical structure.
manifest.longevityDesc: Return, care, continuity. Sustainable projects, revisiting places, maintaining community relationships.

europeanProjects.title: European projects
europeanProjects.aboutSubtitle: Art as a tool for participation, equality and dialogue
europeanProjects.aboutP1: Since 2025, we have been expanding our activities through grants and international partnerships. Our sister organization STOCKHOLM! project operates in Sweden.
europeanProjects.partnersDesc: Find the complete list of partners on the Partners page.
europeanProjects.membershipsDesc: We are members of ENCC (European Network of Cultural Centres) and CAE (Culture Action Europe).
europeanProjects.currentProjectTitle: Art & Design Without Borders: Creative Synergies Between Czech Republic and Sweden
europeanProjects.currentProjectPartners: Partners: PRAHO! (coordinator), Subtopia (Sweden), STOCKHOLM! project, Studio P.A.N.K., Kollektivet Livet
europeanProjects.currentProjectOutputs: Outputs: participatory interventions, community methodology, shared digital tools
europeanProjects.upcomingDesc: CERV, Horizon Europe, Creative Europe (CREA), Nordic Culture Fund, Czech national grants
europeanProjects.teamP1: Annamarie Čermáková (founder, Stockholm) and Veronika Matějková (co-founder, Prague) lead a team of approximately 20 members with an external Strategic Commission.

contact.title: Contact
contact.intro: Contact us via email, phone, or contact form. All inquiries are handled within 24 hours. For urgent matters, reach us on

media.title: For media
media.intro: Thank you for giving our words space! Below you'll find contacts for our team and access to the press center.
media.pressCenterDesc: In our press center you'll find press releases, logos, and photographs for download.
